Farouk "Frank" Agrama (Arabic) (a mụrụ n'abalị 1, ọnwa Jenụwarị, afọ 1930 na Arish, Egypt) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye mmepụta ihe nkiri America a mụrụ n'Ijipt, onye edemede na onye ọchụnta ego. Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye bụbu "Chief Executive Officer" (CEO) nke Harmony Gold USA, Inc.
N'afọ 1970 na mmalite afọ 1980, Agrama mere ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na-efu obere ego nke gụnyere The Godfather's Friend, Queen Kong na Dawn of the Mummy
Ọ malitekwara ire ikike mgbasa ozi site na Paramount Pictures, nke ọ resịrị enyi ya, onye bụbu praịm minista Ịtali Silvio Berlusconi, na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi nke Mediaset.
N'afọ 1983, ya na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi South African ("SABC") nwetara nkwekọrịta iji kesaa obere ihe nkiri Shaka Zulu. N'otu afọ ahụ, o guzobere "Harmony Gold USA, Inc".

N'agbanyeghị nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma Shaka Zulu n'ụwa niile, mkparịta ụka Agrama nwere nkà hapụrụ SABC ka ọ tụfuo ego n'ezie, ebe Harmony Gold nwere ọtụtụ uru. A ga-emecha mara Harmony Gold maka imepụta ihe nkiri dịka Robotech: The Shadow Chronicles, ọrụ ndị ọzọ Robotech n'afọ 1993 miniseries Heidi.

Dịka Los Angeles Times si kwuo, ndị ọkàiwu nke Milan, n'ọnwa Nọvemba 21, 2006, boro Agrama, tinyere onye bụbu praịm minista Ịtali Silvio Berlusconi na ndị ọzọ iri, ebubo n'ikpe maka igwu wayo ụtụ isi, mmefu ego na ndekọ ego ụgha na Mediaset

N'ezie, n'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2012, a mara Agrama ikpe mgbe ikpe a were ogologo oge, ebe Berlusconi, ma ọ bụ otu ya, kwuru na ọ zụtara ikike ihe nkiri USA site n'aka ya na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Mediaset na ọnụahịa dị elu. Ebe ọ bụ na ọ dị ihe karịrị afọ 70, a tọhapụrụ ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ kpọmkwem ma ọ nọrọghị n'ụlọ ikpe n'ezie.
